article:
'ABC' is the name of a regional news programme for Stockholm County and Uppsala
County in Sweden broadcast by Sveriges Television (SVT). The programme was
started in 1987, making Stockholm and Uppsala the last counties in Sweden to
receive regional television news.

The programme is broadcast from the SVT news studio in Stockholm and has a local
office in Uppsala.

The name comes from the county letters for Stockholm (AB) and Uppsala (C).

Since 25 August 2008 Uppsala County has an own programme called SVT Uppland.
